sentences.en: Exotic Woods, Exotic Flooring, Softwood Elliotis Pine, Exotic Plywood , Decking, Timber, Timber Products and Plank.
sentences.cn: 采购产品异国的森林, 异国的地板, 软木材松树, 异国的夹板, 装饰木材, 木材产品和厚木板.

sentences.en: It would be better to use softwood, which grows in cooler climes in sustainably managed forests.
sentences.cn: 使用软木资源将会是更好的选择, 这些软木生长在气候较凉爽且可持续管理的森林里.

sentences.en: Measurements include fibre length and width distributions, hardwood to softwood ratios, fines content, curl, kink, coarseness and vesselcell content.
sentences.cn: 测量包括纤维的长度和宽度的分布、硬木和软木的比例、.细小纤维的成分、纤维卷、纤维结、粗糙度、树干细胞成分。

sentences.en: Processing category: Corn, peanut, dried potato grains, chemical raw materials, plastics, wood powder, softwood slurries, etc.
sentences.cn: 加工类别: 玉米 、 花生 、 瓜干等粮食类, 化工原料类, 塑料类, 木粉类, 软木类, 浆类等.

sentences.en: Pulp made from softwood ( coniferous ) trees, e . g. fir. pine spruce . As distinct from pulp.
sentences.cn: 用软木 ( 针叶树 ),例如枞, 松, 杉等, 所制成的纸浆有别于硬木浆.

sentences.en: Softwood pulp: Pulp made from softwood ( coniferous ) trees, e . g. fir. pine, spruce . As distinct from Hardwood pulp.
sentences.cn: 软木浆: 用软木 ( 针叶树 ), 例如枞, 松, 杉等,所制成的纸浆有别于硬木浆.

sentences.en: Softwood sulfite pulp is light colored and contains a comparatively small amount of lignin.
sentences.cn: 亚硫酸盐针叶木浆颜浅,木素含量相对较低.

sentences.en: Softwood trees have thin, needle - like leaves.
sentences.cn: 软材树的叶片纤细, 呈针状.

sentences.en: Soluble sugars , endogenous hormones and their ratio in the tea softwood cuttings during rooting were analyzed.
sentences.cn: 分析了茶树插穗生根过程中内源激素含量及相互比值动态变化.

sentences.en: The endogenous hormone changes of cutting woods trees and softwood cuttings were contrarieties.
sentences.cn: 采穗母树的内源激素变化与插条的内源激素变化相反.

sentences.en: The mattress is supported on a softwood frame.
sentences.cn: 床垫用软木材架子支撑着。

sentences.en: Zero - span tension technology a and reliable method for assessing the axial tensile strength of softwood tracheids.
sentences.cn: 零距拉伸是评价微尺度木材纵向力学强度的有效手段之一.

trans.tran_en: wood from trees such as  pine  and  fir  that is cheap and easy to cut, or a tree with this type of wood
